channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42538|2024-09-17T00:11:59.293Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a parameter injection via passphrase, which enables the attacker to supply uncontrolled input.

item.title: CVE-2018-14808|2024-09-17T03:54:18.431Z -- emerson -- ams%20device%20manager
item.description: Emerson AMS Device Manager v12.0 to v13.5. Non-administrative users are able to change executable and library files on the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2018-14804|2024-09-17T00:16:05.252Z -- emerson -- ams%20device%20manager
item.description: Emerson AMS Device Manager v12.0 to v13.5. A specially crafted script may be run that allows arbitrary remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-14797|2024-09-17T04:19:50.624Z -- emerson -- deltav%20dcs
item.description: Emerson DeltaV DCS versions 11.3.1, 12.3.1, 13.3.0, 13.3.1, R5 allow a specially crafted DLL file to be placed in the search path and loaded as an internal and valid DLL, which may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-19021|2024-09-17T03:52:35.783Z -- emerson -- emerson%20deltav
item.description: A specially crafted script could bypass the authentication of a maintenance port of Emerson DeltaV DCS Versions 11.3.1, 11.3.2, 12.3.1, 13.3.1, 14.3, R5.1, R6 and prior, which may allow an attacker to cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-42536|2024-09-17T00:41:22.230Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a disclosure of peer username and password by allowing all users access to read global variables.
